content.title: Mukhya Mantri Kanyadaan Yojana
content.beneficiary: Daughters from economically weaker sections of society
content.details: The Mukhya Mantri Kanyadaan Yojana in Himachal Pradesh is a welfare scheme aimed at providing financial assistance for the marriage of daughters from economically weaker sections of society. Under this scheme, daughters of families below the poverty line, widows, destitute women, and families with an annual income of less than Rs. 35,000 are eligible for financial assistance from the government for their marriage. The scheme aims to reduce the financial burden on families during the marriage of their daughters and promote gender equality. The scheme has been successful in providing financial support to many families, particularly those from underprivileged backgrounds, and helping them to celebrate the marriage of their daughters with dignity and joy.
benefits: Financial assistance for the marriage of daughters.
Reducing the financial burden on families during marriage.
Helping families from underprivileged backgrounds celebrate the marriage of their daughters with dignity and joy.
eligibility: Daughters of families below the poverty line.
Families with an annual income of less than Rs. 35,000
content.application_process: Go to the official website https://edistrict.hp.gov.in/pages/services/designForm/InfoPages/CM_Bestowing_Plan_(Mukhya_Mantri_Kanyadaan_Yojana).xhtml, fill the application and click on Submit Button, you will be redirected to the payment window, pay the application fees (if applicable), download the confirmation receipt.
documents_required: Proof of Annual Family Income of the applicant
Proof of the Date of Marriage

faqs.question: Who Is Eligible To Apply For The Mukhya Mantri Kanyadaan Yojana?
faqs.answer: Daughters of families below the poverty line, widows, destitute women, and families with an annual income of less than Rs. 35,000 are eligible to apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: What Is The Aim Of The Mukhya Mantri Kanyadaan Yojana?
faqs.answer: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance for the marriage of daughters from economically weaker sections of society and promote gender equality.

faqs.question: How Much Financial Assistance Is Provided Under The Scheme?
faqs.answer: The amount of financial assistance provided under the scheme varies and is determined by the state government.

faqs.question: Which documents are required to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Proof of Age (Men and Women), Bonafide Himachali Certificate, Proof of Annual Family Income of applicant, Proof of the Date of Marriage, BPL Certificate.

faqs.question: What Is The Application Process For The Scheme?
faqs.answer: Interested applicants can apply for the scheme through the official website or through the designated government offices in their area.

faqs.question: Can The Financial Assistance Be Used For Purposes Other Than Marriage?
faqs.answer: No, the financial assistance provided under the scheme is meant only for the purpose of marriage.

faqs.question: Can A Family Apply For Financial Assistance For The Marriage Of More Than One Daughter?
faqs.answer: Yes, families can apply for financial assistance for the marriage of up to two daughters.

faqs.question: Is There A Deadline For Applying For The Scheme?
faqs.answer: There is no specific deadline for applying for the scheme, but interested applicants are encouraged to apply as soon as possible.
